DOC.detailed_description: Multicenter , double-blind , randomize , parallel placebo-controlled outpatient study . The study consist 2 part : part A 6-week double-blind treatment period part B 6-week open-label treatment period . During part A study , subject randomly assign 1 2 treatment regimen : 2 etanercept 25 mg placebo weekly , administer subcutaneously ( SC ) . After completion part A , subject receive 2 etanercept 25 mg weekly . The use placebo control part A necessary allow valid comparison provide quantitative assessment effect .
